content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) and inserter (position y1) that puts iron ore into the furnace
- Stone furnace (position x2) and inserter (position y2) that puts iron ore into the furnace
- Stone furnace (position x3) and inserter (position y3) that puts coal into the furnace

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have enough materials before performing actions that require resources.
